text: “Ogu ihoo hagaaloho digau Israel, au bolo goodou huogodoo gi iloo donu bolo ma go Jesus dela ne hidi ai di agoago o di wwede o nia huaidu dela e agoago ai gimaadou adu gi goodou. Goodou gi iloo bolo tangada ma ga hagadonu a Mee, geia gu mehede mai gi daha mo ono huaidu huogodoo. Nnaganoho Moses le e deemee di haga maahede goodou gi daha mo nia huaidu.
